Detailed Description

Just a container for most settings shared between several objects.
Settings that are automatically defined:
- basedir
- last working directory (lwd) - initially usr/worked - but can be overriden
by settings from the loaded model (project.xml)

Settings that are loaded from XML files:
- menu widget ??? - put the path to resources in the XML file menu.xml ???
- upper toolbox widget ??? - same as for the menu widget ???
- canvas widget
- XML Editor
- console
- status bar???

Definition at line 23 of file settings.py.

00088         """Adds data to XML file paths.xml"""
00089         
00090         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00091         root = tree.getroot() 
00092 
00093         if (root.find(data).tag == data):
00094 
00095             if data == 'modules':
00096                 self["extraModulesPath"][element['name']] = element['path']
00097                 module = tree.SubElement(root.find(data), 'module')
00098                 name   = tree.SubElement(module, 'name')
00099                 name.text = element['name']
00100                 path   = tree.SubElement(module, 'path')
00101                 path.text = element['path']
00102             
00103             if data == "lwd":
00104                 self['lwd'] = element
00105                 lwd = root.find(data)
00106                 lwd.text = element
00107          
00108             tree.write(self["XMLPath"], encoding = "UTF-8")

00110                                           :
00111         """Removes data to XML file paths.xml"""
00112         
00113         tree = ET.parse(self["XMLPath"])
00114         root = tree.getroot() 
00115 
00116         if (root.find(data).tag == data) and (element in self["extraModulesPath"]):
00117             if data == 'modules':
00118                 del self["extraModulesPath"][element]
00119                 module = root.find('modules')
00120                 for i in module.findall('module'):   
00121                     if i[0].text == element:
00122                         module.remove(i)
00123             
00124             if data == "lwd": # resets to default /usr/worked
00125                 self['lwd'] = 'usr/worked'
00126                 lwd = root.find(data)
00127                 lwd.text = 'usr/worked'
00128
